title: Brandi Carlile on Singing 'America the Beautiful' at Super Bowl
desc: Brandi Carlile talks about what it means to sing 'America the Beautiful' at the Super Bowl in a time of national turmoil, as a song of 'fragile hope.'

title: Southern hospital IT outage caused by third-party hardware failure, Health NZ says
desc: The outage took out systems doctors and nurses need, forcing them to use paper for 36 hours.

title: RSF drone attack kills 24 people fleeing fighting in central Sudan, says doctors group
desc: Eight children including two infants among dead in vehicle carrying displaced people, says Sudan Doctors Network

title: Gyökeres double keeps Arsenal on title track in stroll past sloppy Sunderland
desc: Viktor Gyökeres scored twice as Arsenal extended their lead to nine points at the top of the Premier League with a 3-0 home win over Sunderland

title: Piper Sandler Cuts monday.com Ltd. (MNDY) Price Target to $170, Keeps Overweight Rating
desc: We recently published an article titled 13 High Growth Cloud Stocks to Buy. Piper Sandler lowered its price target on monday.com Ltd. (NASDAQ:MNDY) to $170 from $250 on February 3, while maintaining an Overweight rating, following a transfer of coverage. The adjustment was part of broader target cuts across the platforms and applications group, reflecting […]

title: NCCE Engages Kunuma Community On Rule Of Law, Anti-Corruption
desc: On Thursday, February 4, 2026, the Sefwi Wiawso Municipal Office of the National Commission for Civic Education (NCCE) held a community engagement at the Church of Pentecost Hall in Kunuma. The event focused on the theme “Rule of Law and Fight Against Corruption,” bringing together the Chief, elders, and residents…

title: Wellington SH1 tunnel closures begin
desc: Wellington's Terrace Tunnel will be closing for work overnight this week.

title: “‘Memento Mori’ reminds us to live”
desc: Neuroscientist Brian Pennie once had a near death experience as a heroin addict. He now has a countdown calendar in his kitchen where he marks off the weeks he has left on this earth. He explains why reflecting on the motto, ‘Memento Mori’/’Remember That You Will Die’ helps you live life more intentionally.

title: How the Epstein-Barr virus triggers MS in some people
desc: Multiple sclerosis is also caused by a virus carried by almost all humans. A new study provides an explanation as to why only certain people develop the disease. This also opens up the possibility of a treatment.

title: Plane spotters call for dedicated aircraft viewing area at Adelaide Airport
desc: Aviation enthusiasts gather at spots around Adelaide Airport to catch a glimpse of planes taking off and landing, but say it is becoming more difficult because of developments within and around the airport.
